subject: America's Cup
lead_paragraph: The America’s Cup appears headed toward a Deed of Gift race, a best-of-three duel between the champion Alinghi and BMW Oracle Racing next summer. That possibility drew nearer yesterday when Ernesto Bertarelli, the president of the Swiss syndicate that owns Alinghi, said it would be impossible to stage a full race with a challengers series in 2009. A day after he proposed changing the Deed of Gift — the 156-year-old document that governs the event — he said a 33rd edition could not be held before 2011.
